name: Harold RTP
description:
Harold and his friends are having a picnic at a bustling park. Harold has a nightmare. He tells his friends about it.

A short scene (close to 5 min) made by den399 as an entry for the "Let's Make a Scene: Sounds of Harmony Contest".

Credits (more details in-game and in game folder):

Graphics:  Kadokawa Corp./Yoji Ojima.

Sound Effects: 

Kadokawa Corp./Yoji Ojima, archeos, bruno-auzet, eguobyte, florianreichelt, joelcarrsound, klavo1985, marc3122, mccormick-iain, missozzy, nachtmahrtv, sarson, SoundEffectsFactory, soundsexciting, stib, (deleted)user2104797, welvynzportersamples.

BGM: 

"A Battle Awaits" - Sonancy Designs (JRPG and Fantasy Music Vol.1); 

"DFRM1_BGM09_Field_Town" - TK.Projects (Dramatic Fantasy RPG Music Vol.1); 

"Opening the Portal" - Joel Steudler (Cursed Kingdoms Music Pack); 

"The Voice of the Wind" - Tyler Cline (Tyler Cline’s Cinematic Fantasy Music Pack);  

"Tokyo Poetry" - ayato sound create (Tokyo Poetry).

Plugins: 

RM CoreScript Team, RS (biud436), Yami, Yanfly Engine Plugins (YEP).

Made in RPG Maker MV.

Thanks for stopping by! =)
